events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I would like to request a refund as it doesn't fit me properly and I am not satisfied with the product.
The customer's message indicates a refund request due to size dissatisfaction. Assigning case to cluster 'Refund' for processing.
Assigning this refund case to Agent Sarah Thompson for further assistance and resolution of the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your recent purchase. I understand you'd like to request a refund due to sizing issues.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been worn or washed? This will help us process your refund quickly.
The order number is 123456789, and I have not worn or washed the jacket. It's still in the original condition with tags attached.
Thank you for the information. We have initiated your refund process, and you should receive the amount back to your payment method within 5-7 business days.
Thank you for the prompt response and help. I appreciate the quick initiation of the refund process.
The refund case has been successfully resolved with the refund processed. Please reach out if you have any further questions or concerns.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with regarding your recent purchase.
Yes, I received the refund today. Everything is clear now. Thanks again for the excellent customer service!
Closing this case as the refund has been received and the customer has expressed satisfaction. Thank you for choosing us.
We have sent a short satisfaction survey to get your feedback on the handling of your refund case.
